assignments.name: Add_In_Use_Competitor_to_Flow_Collection
assignments.label: Add In Use Competitor to Flow Collection

assignments.name: Add_Not_In_Use_Competitor_to_Flow_Collection
assignments.label: Add Not In Use Competitor to Flow Collection

assignments.name: Add_Placeholder_Competitor_to_Insert_Collection_0
assignments.label: Add Placeholder Competitor to Insert Collection

assignments.name: Add_Unsure_Competitor_to_Flow_Collection
assignments.label: Add Unsure Competitor to Flow Collection

assignments.name: Assign_No_Decision_Forbidden_Error_Message
assignments.label: Assign No Decision Forbidden Error Message

value.stringValue: No Decision is not allowed for Renewal opportunities.

assignments.description: Auto-assigns the "Is this the current tool in use" field to "Yes" if the user picked the corresponding do-not-return option from the screen.
assignments.name: AutoAssign_InUse_From_OppCompetitorScreen_Assignment
assignments.label: Auto-assign In Use

assignments.name: Competitor_In_Use_from_Screen_Assignment
assignments.label: Assign Competitor In Use from Screen

assignments.description: Sets the Reason, Product Reason, "Did Competitor Win", and required fields values on the placeholder for the upcoming database operation. Presumably, if the deal was lost to a given competitor, then they won and are the current tool in use.
assignments.name: Reason_Product_Reason_Competitor_Won_on_Placeholder_Assignment
assignments.label: Set Additional Placeholder Fields

assignments.description: With the Fields feature, and placeholder value that's NOT covered by it needs to cleared here. Setting if it's the tool in use gets changed based on user selection so it doesn't need to be cleared here. The fact it's a restricted picklist could also lead to unintended, insidious bugs in the future if the picklist values change.
assignments.name: Reset_Placeholder_Competitor
assignments.label: Reset Placeholder Competitor

assignments.name: Reset_Placeholder_for_Adding_Competitors_Sequence
assignments.label: Reset Placeholder for Adding Competitors Sequence

assignments.description:
Resets the Insert collection in case they return to the Competitor screen and want to add more.
The placeholder's "Is this the current tool" is set to "Don't know" as a "default" value to appear on initial loading of the Add New Competitor screen, above, regardless of what they chose, if they chose. The auto-assignment will still make sure it's "Yes" where appropriate in the database; this is for Flow user experience only.
assignments.name: Reset_Record_Processing_State
assignments.label: Reset Record Processing State

assignments.description: Sets flow variables that store the number of each type of Competitor as organized in the above loop. Used for conditional visibility in the Opp Competitor screen.
assignments.name: Set_Competitor_Use_Type_Counts
assignments.label: Set Competitor Use Type Counts

assignments.description: Sets the name of the current in-use Competitor in the Flow. If there's only one, then this assignment will capture the name correctly. If there's more than 1, then the >1 In Use Competitors branch below will find it after sorting by Created Date.
assignments.name: Set_In_Use_Competitor_Title_Organize_Competitor_Loop_Assignment
assignments.label: Set In Use Competitor Title

assignments.description: Sets the most recent set of Opp Competitor values for the context placeholder Competitor record. Will be appended to a record collection to be inserted later. Using the Fields feature, the Name if Other and Details fields are set back in the Screen itself. So only the Competitor Id, Opportunity Id, and Current Tool in Use need to be set, along with any other fields (with the current scope of the Fields feature) that are added to the Add New Competitor screen.
assignments.name: Set_New_Competitor_Record_Values_0
assignments.label: Set New Competitor Record Values

choices.name: Add_New_Competitor_Current_OppCompetitor_Screen_Choice
choices.choiceText: I want to add the current Vendor and move on (will not return to this screen).

choices.description: Lets the user add a new Competitor and then return to the screen in case it's not the one in use.
choices.name: Add_New_Competitor_ReturnToScreen_Competitor_Screen_Choice
choices.choiceText: Add a new Competitor but return to this screen.

choices.description: For use on the "Select Competitor Lost to" screen.
choices.name: Add_New_Competitor_Won_Competitor
choices.choiceText: Add the competitor the deal was lost to.

choices.name: Add_New_In_Use_Competitor_CompetitorScreen
choices.choiceText: Add new competitor with "Current Tool In Use" = Yes

choices.name: Add_New_NotInUse_Competitor_CompetitorScreen
choices.choiceText: Add new Competitor with "Tool Currently in Use" = No

choices.name: Add_New_Unsure_Competitor_CompetitorScreen
choices.choiceText: Add new Competitor with "Tool in Use" = Don't know

choices.name: Entered_OtherName_New_LostTo_Competitor_Choice
choices.choiceText: I've entered a name above if 'Other' was chosen.

collectionProcessors.description: Since this collection is only used in this part of the Flow, before the Opportunity Competitors screen, we keep the one that was created most recently.
collectionProcessors.name: In_Use_Competitors_by_Created_Date_Collection_Sort
collectionProcessors.label: Sort In Use Competitors by Created Date

decisions.description: Uses the create or update flag set in the update path, above, to determine which context to use the placeholder record variable in.
decisions.name: Add_or_Update_Competitor
decisions.label: Add or Update Competitor

decisions.description: Decision to decide where to re-route execution via connectors.
decisions.name: After_Competitor_Insert_ReturnTo_OppScreen_Decision
decisions.label: Return to Opp Competitor Screen?

decisions.description: Decision that branches Flow logic based on the Loss Category value selected on the initial screen.
decisions.name: Branch_on_Loss_Category_Decision
decisions.label: Branch on Loss Category

decisions.description: Checks the Type field of the Opportunity to make sure the correct functionality branch is used.
decisions.name: Branch_on_Opportunity_Type_Decision
decisions.label: Branch on Opportunity Type

decisions.description: For selecting the reason deal lost fields, special logic is needed if they're adding a new record or updating an existing one.
decisions.name: Competitor_Lost_Selection_Decision
decisions.label: Competitor Lost Selection Branch

decisions.description: Checks if there's a current competitor(s). If there's more than one, then the name of the newest one is used.
decisions.name: Current_Competitor_Title_Decision
decisions.label: Current Competitor(s)?

decisions.description: At the moment, Opp Error is the only selectable choice. Decision included here for extensibility. Currently goes straight to asking if the stage should be updated.
decisions.name: Funnel_Error_Outcome_Branch_on_Loss_Reason
decisions.label: Branch on Loss Reason

decisions.description: Currently, this Loss Category only has one Loss Reason. Decision included for extensibility.
decisions.name: Lost_Deal_Outcome_Branch_on_Loss_Reason
decisions.label: Branch on Loss Reason

decisions.description: If they indicated wanting to return to the Opp competitor screen, then they chose the "Is this the current tool in use" value in the Add New Competitor Screen. Otherwise, it's automatically set to yes for the placeholder.
decisions.name: Returning_to_Opp_Competitor_Screen_Decision
decisions.label: Returning to Opp Competitor Screen?

Flow.description: BODEV-3189 & BODEV-3299 Reason field missing when "Did competitor win this Account" - Yes Updated the Flow to capture Loss Category, Primary Loss Reason & Loss Reason Detail when a New business opportunity is created & its Loss Category/Loss Reason is Funnel Error/Opp Error.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Used in selecting the competitor lost to.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: All_Competitors_RCS

dynamicChoiceSets.description: To use for displaying on the Opp Competitors screen.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: In_Use_Competitors_RCS

dynamicChoiceSets.description: To use for displaying on the Opp Competitors screen.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Not_In_Use_Competitors_RCS

dynamicChoiceSets.description: To use for displaying on the Opp Competitors screen.
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Unsure_Competitors_RCS

Flow.label: Screen: Opportunity Check Readiness - Lost

loops.description: Having to use a Loop since it's the only way to access an object in a collection variable
loops.name: Assign_Latest_Competitor_Title_Loop
loops.label: Assign Latest Competitor Title

loops.description: This loop iterates through the previous Get Records collection in order to set the placeholder Opportunity Competitor record to the record that was selected in the previous screen.
loops.name: Competitor_LostTo_Setting_Placeholder_Loop
loops.label: Loop Through Competitors

loops.description: Loops through the existing competitors and sorts them into collections based on whether they're selected as "is this the current tool in use".
loops.name: Organize_Existing_Competitors_Loop
loops.label: Organize Existing Competitors Loop

recordUpdates.description: Update for the context Opportunity to (currently) save the COVID checkbox value. Since they're already saved to the context record with the Fields feature, we just call the update and pass it here.
recordUpdates.name: Update_Context_Opp_Renewal_Upsell_Checkboxes_Update
recordUpdates.label: Update Context Opp

recordUpdates.description: Updates the selected competitor automatically: "Is this the current tool in use" = Yes
recordUpdates.name: Update_Selected_Competitor_OppCompetitor_Screen
recordUpdates.label: Update Selected Competitor

screens.description: If other Competitor fields are accessible through the Fields feature in the future, then update the "Reset Placeholder Competitor" assignment below to add any new Fields elements added since they'll need to be reset between iterations of the screen.
screens.name: Add_New_Competitor_Screen
screens.label: Add New Competitor Screen

fields.name: Add_New_Competitor_MultiLoop_Ack_RB
fields.fieldText: Please acknowledge the following:

fields.name: Competitor_InUse_NewBusiness_AddingCompetitor_PL
fields.fieldText: Is this competitor currently in use?

fields.name: Did_this_competitor_win_the_account
fields.fieldText: Did this competitor win the account?

fields.name: EnterMoreDetails_NewBusiness_NewCompetitor_Warning_DT
fields.fieldText: Please enter additional details about the current competitor. Leaving this blank will cause an error.

value.stringValue: Product Reason (only if Product Capabilities selected above)

fields.name: Stage_Update_Prompt_DT
fields.fieldText: Check this checkbox if the Opportunity's Stage should be updated to Closed Lost.

value.stringValue: Product Reason (only if Product Capabilities selected above)

fields.name: Current_ToolInUse_LostCompetitor
fields.fieldText: Is this the current tool in use?

fields.name: Enter_Details_LostCompetitor_DT
fields.fieldText: Please enter details as to why the deal was lost. Leaving this blank will cause an error.

fields.name: Selecting_Competitor_Lost_To_Select_DT
fields.fieldText:
Select the competitor the deal was lost to, if it's present in the list.

If the competitor of interest is not listed, then click the Add choice to configure values for a new competitor record on the next screen.

fields.name: Selecting_Competitor_Lost_To_AddNew_DT
fields.fieldText:
Add is the only choice, meaning this Opportunity doesn't have any competitors.

Selecting it will prompt you on the next screen to configure values for the new competitor.

fields.name: Competitor_Lost_To_RB
fields.fieldText: Select the Competitor that was Lost to:

screens.description: For Renewal and Upsell Opportunities, the COVID and Uncontrollable checkboxes need to be prompted for.
screens.name: COVID_Uncontrollable_Screen_Renewal_Upsell
screens.label: COVID/Uncontrollable Screen

fields.name: EconomicCondtionsText
fields.fieldText: Please select if the current economic conditions impacted the decision of the customer or not and elaborate further in the loss reason detail.

fields.name: Did_current_economic_conditions_impact_the_decision
fields.fieldText: Did current economic conditions impact the decision?

fields.name: COVID_Uncontrollable_Explanation_DT
fields.fieldText: If the COVID checkbox is checked, please elaborate further in the loss reason detail on the next screen.

fields.name: Reason_for_Churn
fields.fieldText: Reason for Churn
fields.helpText:
Known: "Notice sent on time"

Unexpected: "Notice sent after last notice date"

Uncontrollable: "Bankrupt or M&A"

Platform Transfer: "Moved from Webdam to Flagship"

Write off: "Finance only should pick this option"

Internal Transfer: "Moved from OEM to Webdam"

fields.name: Create_Records_ErrorScreen_DT
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while attempting to add records into Salesforce. Please consult/share the following error message:


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: Get_Error_Screen_Message_DT
fields.fieldText:
An error occurred while retrieving records from the database. Please consult/share the following error message:


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: OppStageReminder_DT
fields.fieldText: At the end of this process, you'll be asked if the stage should be updated to Closed Lost.

fields.name: LossCategory_Reason_Error_DT
fields.fieldText: {!LossCategoryReason_Screen_Error_Message}

fields.name: Opportunity_Type_Warning_DT
fields.fieldText: The Opportunity Type is displayed here for functional reasons. Please do not pick a different value; changing it here will do nothing and might lead to errors.

fields.name: Loss_Reason_Detail_inFlow
fields.fieldText: Loss Reason Detail

fields.name: Loss_Reason_Detail_inFlow_0
fields.fieldText: Loss Reason Detail

fields.name: New_LostTo_Competitor_Selection_DT
fields.fieldText: Select the Competitor for the new Opportunity Competitor record here. Other details will be configured on the next screen.

fields.name: RequiredWorkaround_OtherName_New_LostTo_Competitor_RB
fields.fieldText: Please acknowledge the following:
fields.helpText: If a name isn't provided with competitor 'Other', record creation will fail.

fields.name: Current_Competitor_Title_OppCompetitor_DT
fields.fieldText: Current Vendor: {!current_Competitor_Name_inFlow}

fields.name: One_Current_Competitor_Needed_Warning_OppCompetitorScreen_DT
fields.fieldText:
Who is the Current Vendor?

At least one competitor needs to be marked as the current vendor.

fields.name: Competitor_Screen_Explanation_DT
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity Competitors are listed below.

Select the most relevant Add option to add a new competitor.


Selecting a competitor will mark it as the current vendor.

fields.name: All_Competitors_Opp_Competitor_Screen_RB
fields.fieldText: Select/Add a competitor:

fields.name: Unsupported_Opp_Type_DT
fields.fieldText:
The Type of this Opportunity is not supported in the Flow.


Clicking Finish will return you to the Opportunity record page.

fields.name: Unsupp_Loss_Category_DT
fields.fieldText:
The Loss Category you selected ({!Loss_Category_inFlow}) is currently has no additional functionality in the Flow.


Click Previous to return to the start screen, or continue to update to Closed Lost.

fields.name: Unsupp_Loss_Reason_DT
fields.fieldText:
The Loss Reason you selected ({!Loss_Reason_inFlow}) currently has no additional functionality in the Flow.


Click Previous to return to the start screen, or continue to update to Closed Lost.

fields.name: Update_Records_ErrorScreen_DT
fields.fieldText:
There was an error when trying to update a record in Salesforce. Please consult/share the following error message:


Error Message:

{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

variables.description: Holds the Id of the currently selected Competitor record. This is used when automatically setting the current tool in use value when selecting a competitor on the Opportunity Competitor screen.
variables.name: currentSelectedCompetitor_Id_inFlow

variables.description: A skeleton Opportunity Competitor record variable to reset the placeholder record variable between the Lost to Competitor and adding additional competitors branches.
variables.name: Empty_Competitor_RV

variables.description: Empty record collection variable for resetting the adding competitors state after inserting. Should not have records added to it.
variables.name: Empty_Competitors_DO_NOT_ADD_TO_RC

variables.description: Though the API name is confusing, this does pull in the context record that the Screen Flow is launched from. In our case, this is the opportunity record that the user is clicking the "Check Readiness - Lost" button on.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Used in the Lost Deal branch of New Business.
variables.name: totalCompetitors_Count
